alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 6:10PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE AND UNION COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA, NORTHERN PREBLE, WEST CENTRAL CHAMPAIGN, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY AND CENTRAL MIAMI COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 700 PM EST... At 608 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Piqua to 6 miles northwest of Liberty, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Troy, Piqua, Eaton, West Milton, Covington, Liberty, Arcanum, Lewisburg, Pleasant Hill, Clayton, Salem, Phillipsburg, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester, Laura, Fletcher, Pitsburg and Potsdam. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 1 and 18. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 71 and 85.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
